definition: A set of principles or beliefs on the basis of which opinions are formed.
example: From a legal standpoint, the case is clear.
example_translation: Z punktu widzenia prawa sprawa jest jasna.

definition: Believing that there should be extreme political or social change.
example: He has radical views on economic reform.
example_translation: Ma radykalne poglądy na temat reformy gospodarczej.

definition: (Disapproving) Opposed to political or social change or new ideas.
example: The government is often criticized for its reactionary policies.
example_translation: Rząd jest często krytykowany za swoje reakcyjne polityki.

definition: Not inclined to trust change, especially if it is sudden.
example: His conservative approach to business was very successful.
example_translation: Jego konserwatywne podejście do biznesu było bardzo udane.

definition: (Disapproving) Lacking in experience; opposite is mature.
example: His behavior was very immature for his age.
example_translation: Jego zachowanie było bardzo niedojrzałe jak na jego wiek.

definition: Not influenced by personal beliefs or attitudes, based only on facts; opposite is subjective.
example: An objective analysis of the data was conducted.

definition: In a way that is influenced by personal beliefs or attitudes.
Not supporting one person or group more than others.
example: The judge must remain impartial during the trial.
example_translation: Sędzia musi pozostać bezstronny podczas procesu.

definition: Showing an unreasonable liking for something based on personal beliefs or opinions; opposite is biased against.
example: The article was biased in favour of the new policy.
example_translation: Artykuł był uprzedzony na korzyść nowej polityki.

definition: Showing unreasonable dislike for, based on personal beliefs or opinions (stronger and more pejorative than biased); opposite is prejudiced in favour of.
example: He was prejudiced against people from different cultures.
example_translation: Był uprzedzony wobec ludzi z różnych kultur.

definition: Based only on reason; opposite is irrational.
example: She made a rational decision after considering all the facts.
example_translation: Podjęła racjonalną decyzję po rozważeniu wszystkich faktów.

definition: A theory or set of beliefs or principles, particularly one on which a political system or organization is based.
example: The party's ideology is rooted in socialism.
example_translation: Ideologia partii jest zakorzeniona w socjalizmie.

definition: A set of beliefs that is much more thoughtful and serious.
example: His philosophy on life was shaped by his experiences.
example_translation: Jego filozofia życiowa została ukształtowana przez doświadczenia.

example: She holds strong views on environmental issues.
example_translation: Ma silne poglądy na temat kwestii środowiskowych.

definition: To take a position on a particular issue.
example: The company has adopted a strong stance on sustainability.
example_translation: Firma przyjęła zdecydowane stanowisko w sprawie zrównoważonego rozwoju.
